mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shorts_COMMENT(scSeq, sSeq, id, content) VALUES (SComment_seq.NEXTVAL, #{sSeq}, #{id}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE Shorts_comment set content=#{content} WHERE scSeq=#{scSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM Shorts_comment c JOIN shorts s ON s.sSeq = c.sSeq WHERE s.sSeq = #{sSeq} ORDER BY c.indate DESC
